1.title: Return to the 'Aina

2.title: Cecily Steps Up

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Cecily wrote a pity bond and decides to catch the fugitive on her own which Beth is not happy about.

3.title: Road to Redemption Part 1

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: The Chapmans travel to Texas where Dog has to face his past including the arrest which ultimately turned him into a bounty hunter.

4.title: Road to Redemption Part 2

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: The team is in Texas helping catch fugitives for OK Bail Bonds.

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: The Chapmans help train bondsman/ private investigator Elliot Sondag with catching fugitives.

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: The Chapmans are still in Texas where they assist a woman about to lose her home over her nephew's bond.

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Dog and Beth head to Houston to help out a newly married pair of bounty hunters.

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Dog is on the hunt for Hawaii's Most Wanted man.

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Dog continues his hunt for Hawaii's Most Wanted man by applying pressure on his family.

11.title: Catch You on My Way Out of Town

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: The Chapmans return to Alabama when they find out Gage Huffstutler is going to retire from her bail bonds business.

12.title: Old Friends, New Beginnings

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Alesia Kyser needs some help running her husband's bail bonds business after he passes away.

0.title: Dog and Beth: A New Beginning

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

0.plot: The world's most famous bounty hunters Dog and Beth Chapman have been off the air for 15 months, but haven't missed a day of work.

1.title: Dog's New Tricks

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Dog and Beth are on a mission to help Mike Vester of Bail City Bail Bonds track down a $50,000 fugitive.

2.title: Big Trouble in Little Clovis

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Hank Bayless wants to retire after 30 years as a bondman, but not before Dog and Beth help him hunt down two dangerous fugitives.

3.title: Family Bonds

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Dog, Beth and Leland join forces with the Madrid family and take to the mean streets and desolate mess of Albuquerque to track down three slippery fugitives.

4.title: Going to Jackson

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Dog and Beth work with Agent J and bondman Leo Urban to reel in a $500,000 fugitive who's been on the run and in hiding for several months.

5.title: L.A. Consequential

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Dog and Beth work to toughen up a big-hearted and inexperienced bondsman and help him hunt down a $390,000 bounty.

6.title: Norwalk This Way

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Dog and Beth assist Tina, owner of Blazen Bail Bonds, to save her business from going under when a 100K bond comes due.

7.title: Viva Dog Vegas

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: The Chapmans are in Las Vegas, Nevada for the Academy of Country Music Awards and the Professional Bail Agents of the United States conference.

8.title: Doglahoma: A Fistful of Warrants

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: The Chapmans are called to assist two bondsmen with their jumps in Oklahoma but first must hunt down a fugitive hiding out in the Rocky Mountains.

9.title: Doglahoma 2: For a Few Bounties More

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Dog and the crew head to Oklahoma to help Trep Bail Bonds capture fugitives in Oklahoma City.

10.title: Paradise Lost

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: The Chapmans chance to relax at home in Hawaii is abruptly interrupted when they are called to shut down a corrupt bondsman and hunt down his elusive fugitives.

11.title: Dog Days of Kansas

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Dog, Beth and Leland traverse the great plains of Kansas to help a bondswoman and her crew capture a few cunning fugitives while dealing with a troublesome bounty hunter.

12.title: Training Dakota

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Leland raised his son Dakota while still a kid himself. Now Dakota is graduating high school with honors, and wants to join the family business.

13.title: Rock Bottom Bounty

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: Dog and Beth are called to the wilds of Casper, WY to help Jeanine Beagle and Action Bail Bonds track down a dangerous Iraq War veteran gone rogue.

14.title: Big Sky Bounty

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

14.plot: Dog and Beth are summoned to the mountains of Montana to help John Briggs and the bounty hunters of Western Bail Bonds tackle a tough runner with a history of drugs and guns.

15.title: Southern Fried Bounty

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

15.plot: Alabama bondsman Bill Honea reaches out to Dog and Beth to help capture a desperate fugitive who has crossed state lines, and a $60,000 runner with warrants for attempted murder.

16.title: Handcuffed

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

16.plot: Dog and Beth are handcuffed by the laws of Washington state as they struggle to help Angie's Bail Bonds and her bevy of bondsmen clean up their jumps.

17.title: Divine Intervention

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

17.plot: Dog and Beth call upon a higher power to help Randy Bosley and Pacific Northwest Bail Bonding catch their jumps and reunite their fractured family.

18.title: Trouble at Home

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

18.plot: With Dog and Beth on the road, they've gotten behind on their jumps at home. Dakota and Cecily prepare for the test to become licensed bail agents.

19.title: Best of Dog and Beth: On the Hunt

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

19.plot:

 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Action in Jackson - Part I

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Dog and Beth head to Jackson, MI to see their old friend Jeff Kirkpatrick at Lodise Bail Bonds. They're on a mission to train Dion Shepherd, a young man from inner-city Detroit who has a dream of becoming a bondsman and bounty hunter. Can Dog and Beth help make his dreams come true?

2.title: Action in Jackson - Part II

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Dog and Beth continue to help their friend Jeff Kirkpatrick at Lodise Bail Bonds. This time they're on a mission to train Nicki McDonald, a new bondsman who wrote a bad bond for a known runner. Can Dog and Beth show her the ropes and catch Nicki's jump at the same time?

3.title: Rites of Passage

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Dog and Beth are called into action by Royce and Alesia Kyser at A+ Bail Bonds in Alabama. Royce has recently fallen ill, the stack of jumps is growing, and Alesia is desperate for help. Can Dog and Beth train Royce's kids to carry on the family legacy?

4.title: Fathers and Sons

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Dog and Beth visit their old friend Topo Padilla in Sacramento, CA. When Dakota and Topo's son Brandon are tasked with leading the hunt for a dangerous fugitive, it's the challenge of a lifetime. Do they have what it takes to get their man?

5.title: Popcorn Bounty

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Dog and Beth travel to Mobile, Alabama to help the staff of Outlaw Bail Bonds catch some fugitives.

6.title: Big Easy Bounty

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Before helping out the Donnes family in New Orleans, Louisiana, the Chapmans are treated to a crawfish boil.

7.title: Rude Awakening

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Dog and Beth visit Leland on the Big Island, and help him and Dakota track two tough runners in Hilo. Can Dog turn the fugitive's dreams of freedom into a rude awakening?

8.title: The Long Arm of the Dog

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Veteran Alabama bondsman Gage Huffstetler of Fast Feet Bail Bonds reaches out to Dog and Beth with an emergency. She has a jump that has run to California, and the Court has suspended her bail license until she brings him in. Can Dog and Beth help Gage catch her fugitive and get the business back on track?

9.title: Desert Justice

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Dog & Beth journey to the Land Of Enchantment to help out ex-Judge Erminio Martinez and his daughter Amy at Tony Madrid Bail Bonds in Taos, NM. It's just the two of them, and it's hard to keep up with the growing stack of skips. When a drug-addicted runner threatens to leave the state, it takes all of the team's experience and technology to track him. Can Dog and Beth find him before he vanishes into the New Mexico desert?

11.title: Jambalaya Justice

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: In the exciting conclusion of this two-part episode, Dog and Beth take the Statewide team's training to the next level. Can Brandi, Brittney and Megan use the Chapman's techniques to capture their jumps and track down an elusive runner in the wilds of the Bayou?

12.title: Music City Mayhem

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Dog & Beth head to the outskirts of Nashville, Tennessee, to help Andy Baggenstoss of Cumberland Bail Bonds bring in some tough runners from the foothills of the Smoky Mountains. Andy's team has the right gear, but breaking up the close-knit clans of the Tennessee hills isn't easy. Can Dog & Beth crack the code of silence and get the info they need to find their fugitives?

13.title: There's Something About Mary Ellen

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: Dog & Beth head back to Colorado to help their old friend and mentor Mary Ellen Pollack at Mary Ellen's Bail Bonds. Mary wrote a big bond for a robbery suspect, now he's missed court and she's left holding the bag. With over $70,000 on the line and her whole business in jeopardy, can Dog & Beth find Mary's fugitive before he breaks the bank?

14.title: Rocky Mountain Menace

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

14.plot: In one of this season's most exciting episodes, Dog & Beth head back to their hometown of Denver, Colorado, to help Cedric Williams of VIP Bail Bonds bring in a belligerent beater, and chase down a menacing Meth-head who is allegedly running amok in a stolen car. Can Dog & Beth catch them before they harm someone else?

15.title: Family Fugitive

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

15.plot: The Chapmans are back in Hawaii and help out Leland with some jumps in Kona, including a hunt for Kaleo's brother in law.

16.title: Birthday Special Part 1

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

16.plot: Beth & the Chapman clan plan a major surprise party for Dog's 61st birthday. Can Beth put one over on the greatest bounty hunter who ever lived, or will the entire party be brought to its knees when a very special guest arrives?

17.title: Birthday Special Part 2

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

17.plot: The craziness of the Chapman party continues as Beth secretly plans for Dog's surprise birthday party. As the big party draws near, Chris, Leland & Dakota decide to create a new surprise of their own: a striptease from Chris.

-1.title: Love Conquers All

episode of.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt (TV Series 2013– )

-1.plot: Dog and Beth's old friend Leo Urban from Leo's Bail Bonds in Mason, MI is getting married! With the wedding only days away Leo has enough on his plate, so Dog and Beth decide to pitch in and help. Can they clean up Leo's jumps before the wedding, so Leo can relax and enjoy his honeymoon?

imdb.plot outline: The world's most renowned bounty hunters, Dog and Beth Chapman, are taking their show on the road. Joining forces with son, Leland, Dog and Beth leave Hawaii to support and advise fellow bondsmen and bounty hunters across the country as they hunt down some of America's most dangerous criminals. Traveling to cities from coast to coast, the Chapmans work with local bondsmen offices and offer their years of experience to every aspect of the business, from the process of writing bonds to the implementation of tactical tracking and hi-tech device training. With their trademark no-holds barred candor and strong belief in second chances, the Chapmans motivate and inspire the local bondsmen and bounty hunters during adrenaline-filled hunts, all the while showing their contemporaries a few new tricks along the way.
imdb.title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt
plot: Dog and Beth switch gears and help other bail bond agencies who are on the brink of extinction, training them how to create a sustaining bounty hunter business.::Anonymous

The world's most renowned bounty hunters, Dog and Beth Chapman, are taking their show on the road. Joining forces with son, Leland, Dog and Beth leave Hawaii to support and advise fellow bondsmen and bounty hunters across the country as they hunt down some of America's most dangerous criminals. Traveling to cities from coast to coast, the Chapmans work with local bondsmen offices and offer their years of experience to every aspect of the business, from the process of writing bonds to the implementation of tactical tracking and hi-tech device training. With their trademark no-holds barred candor and strong belief in second chances, the Chapmans motivate and inspire the local bondsmen and bounty hunters during adrenaline-filled hunts, all the while showing their contemporaries a few new tricks along the way.::Electus
